title: Rs. 70m robbed at Paliyagoda
content: News Courtesy: Ada Derana An armed gang at Paliyagoda has robbed Rs. 70 Million from a vehicle carrying cash to an ATM machine says Police Spokesman. The theft had taken place at around 1.00 am today at Aluwakella, Thegalapotha by five suspects traveling in two motorbikes. It is reported that the robbers had forcibly stopped…
